channel.description: Recent content in AFM on Matsunaga Lab

item.title: AFM-Fold: Rapid Reconstruction of Protein Conformations from AFM Images
item.description:
T. Kawai, and Y. Matsunaga published a new preprint on bioRxiv.

Read the full paper: AFM-Fold: Rapid Reconstruction of Protein Conformations from AFM Images

item.title: Invited Talk at SPM Workshop 2024
item.description: Prof. Matsunaga gave an invited talk titled “AFM data tip shape estimation and its application to biomolecular dynamics modeling” at the Japanese Society of Microscopy SPM Workshop 2024 held at Hokkaido University Enreiso on January 9, 2025.
